name: The Lab that exists for some reason
name_original: The Lab that exists for some reason
description:
Hi this is my first game. W,A,S,D to move Space to jump, left click to accept and pick up, right click to grappling hook on a metal cyan cube. and yeah thats about it. was on a super big time crunch of 3 days I could work instead of the week. yeah enjoy my really Noob game dev!!!!! 

for some reason the cutscenes did not get uploaded properly.... idk HELP comment a solution plz.

the first time the screen goes black, its supposed to play an animation of an earth quake. the second time its a black hole and it says thank you for playing.

so Thank you for playing!

I just changed the file format to be download able instead so the cutscenes should be able to play I hope......
